expected-result.ddl: create table prod \( id integer\({0}\) not null, name char\({1}\), primary key \( id \) \);

create table table_all \( fieldbit tinyint\(1\), fieldtinyint tinyint\({0}\), fieldsmallint smallint\({1}\), fieldinteger integer\({2}\), fieldbigint bigint\({3}\), fieldfloat float\({4}, {5}\), fielddouble double\({6}, {7}\), fieldreal real\({8}, {9}\), fieldnumeric numeric\({10}, {11}\), fielddecimal decimal\({12}, {13}\), fieldchar char\({14}\), fieldvarchar varchar\({15}\), fieldlongvarchar varchar\({16}\), fielddate date, fieldtime time, fieldtimestamp timestamp\({17}\), fieldbinary binary\({18}\), fieldvarbinary varbinary\({19}\), fieldlongvarbinary varbinary\({20}\), fieldother blob, fieldjavaobject blob, fieldblob blob, fieldclob text \);
